snippet: Mitt Romney’s pledge to overhaul environmental rules would require his administration to make significant revisions to landmark laws and overcome political opposition to oil drilling among other challenges.
abstract: Mitt Romney’s pledge to overhaul environmental rules would require his administration to make significant revisions to landmark laws such as the Clean Air Act, and overcome political opposition to oil drilling among other challenges.
lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney’s pledge to overhaul environmental rules would require his administration to make significant revisions to landmark laws and overcome political opposition to oil drilling among other challenges.

headline.seo: Romney ‘Weed Whacker’ on Environmental Rules May Falter
headline.main: Romney’s Goals on Environmental Regulation Would Face Difficult Path
headline.print_headline: Romney’s Goals on Environmental Regulation Would Face Difficult Path
